biotools.summary: MicroScope is an integrated Web platform for the annotation and exploration of microbial gene functions through genomic, pangenomic and metabolic comparative analysis. It supports submissions of newly assembled genomes and metagenomes, and also provides analysis services for RNA-seq data. The user interface of MicroScope enables collaborative work in a rich comparative context to improve community-based curation efforts.
